content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad Abbasi. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Magdeburg, let me first note that as the landlord, I'm looking to secure the most advantageous rental agreement possible. However, during our current conversation, we will solely focus on discussing the rental price without touching upon additional aspects such as lease term conditions or utility costs. Please present your proposed rental price for the 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, and if it aligns with my expectations, I'll agree to it with the sentence, 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If not, I may choose to end the negotiation with a reason for doing so. Thank you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Understanding your position as a landlord and abiding by the rules given, I aim to secure the lowest price for renting the 50 square meter apartment in the city center, Magdeburg. Considering market conditions and its location, I propose a rental price of 450 Euros per month. If you find this suitable, please respond with 'I agree to the price of 450 Euro!' If not, kindly state a reason for your decision to end the negotiation. Thank you.

TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
